mapper.select: SELECT T.FORM_ID formId, T.FORM_NAME formName, C.FORM_NAME formSupName FROM (SELECT B.FORM_ID, B.FORM_NAME, B.FORM_SUP_ID FROM TB_APPROVAL_SAVE A, TB_APPROVAL_FORM B WHERE A.FORM_ID = B.FORM_ID AND A.EMP_ID = #{empDrafterId})T, TB_APPROVAL_FORM C WHERE T.FORM_SUP_ID = C.FORM_ID AND ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT F.DOC_ID, A.APPROVAL_TITLE, A.APPROVAL_RECOMMAND_DT, A.EMP_DRAFTER_ID, C.FORM_NAME, COUNT(D.ATTACH_ID) attachCnt, G.EMP_NAME empDrafterName, H.CODE_NAME empDrafterOfficial, A.APPROVAL_EMERGENCY_YN FROM TB_APPROVAL A, TB_APPROVAL_DOC B, TB_APPROVAL_FORM C, TB_APPROVAL_ATTACH D, TB_APPROVAL_HISTORY F, TB_EMP G, TB_CODE H WHERE B.DOC_ID = F.DOC_ID(+) AND B.DOC_ID = A.DOC_ID(+) AND F.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID AND C.FORM_ID = B.FORM_ID AND A.DOC_ID = D.DOC_ID(+) AND A.EMP_DRAFTER_ID = G.EMP_ID AND G.CODE_OFFICIAL_ID = H.CODE_ID AND F.EMP_ID = #{empDrafterId} AND F.HISTORY_ST = 0 AND F.HISTORY_TURN = 'Y'
GROUP BY A.APPROVAL_TITLE, A.APPROVAL_RECOMMAND_DT, A.EMP_DRAFTER_ID, F.DOC_ID, C.FORM_NAME, G.EMP_NAME, H.CODE_NAME, A.APPROVAL_EMERGENCY_YN ORDER BY A.APPROVAL_EMERGENCY_YN ,A.APPROVAL_RECOMMAND_DT DESC

SELECT 'Y' YN FROM TB_AGENCY WHERE EMP_GRANTER_ID = (SELECT EMP_ID FROM TB_APPROVAL_HISTORY WHERE DOC_ID = #{docId} AND HISTORY_STEP = 3 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_APPROVAL_HISTORY WHERE DOC_ID = #{docId} AND HISTORY_STEP = 2 AND EMP_ID = #{empId})) AND EMP_AGENCY_ID = #{empId} AND AGENCY_ST = 1
SELECT ATTACH_ID ,ATTACH_PATH ,ATTACH_NAME ,ATTACH_TYPE ,ATTACH_CREATE_DT ,ATTACH_END_DT ,EMP_ATTACHER_ID ,DOC_ID ,ATTACH_VOLUME FROM TB_APPROVAL_ATTACH WHERE DOC_ID = #{docId}
SELECT FORM_ID, FORM_SUP_ID, FORM_NAME, FORM_CONTENT, FORM_PERIOD FROM TB_APPROVAL_FORM WHERE FORM_ID =#{formId}

select D3.* from( select D2.* from( select rownum as seq, D1.* from( SELECT DISTINCT E.DOC_ID, A.APPROVAL_TITLE, A.APPROVAL_RECOMMAND_DT, A.EMP_DRAFTER_ID, A.APPROVAL_ST, C.FORM_NAME, COUNT(D.ATTACH_ID) attachCnt FROM TB_APPROVAL A, TB_APPROVAL_DOC B, TB_APPROVAL_FORM C, TB_APPROVAL_ATTACH D, TB_APPROVAL_HISTORY E WHERE A.DOC_ID = E.DOC_ID(+) AND A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID(+) AND C.FORM_ID = B.FORM_ID AND A.DOC_ID = D.DOC_ID(+) AND (E.EMP_ID = #{empDrafterId} OR E.HISTORY_SUP_ID = #{empDrafterId}) AND E.HISTORY_ST = 1 AND E.HISTORY_TURN = 'N' AND A.APPROVAL_ST IN (2,3)
GROUP BY A.APPROVAL_TITLE, A.APPROVAL_RECOMMAND_DT, A.APPROVAL_ST, A.EMP_DRAFTER_ID, E.DOC_ID, C.FORM_NAME ORDER BY A.APPROVAL_RECOMMAND_DT DESC ) D1 ) D2 where seq >= #{firstIndex} ) D3 where rownum <= #{recordCountPerPage}

select D3.* from( select D2.* from( select rownum as seq, D1.* from( SELECT A.APPROVAL_TITLE, A.APPROVAL_RECOMMAND_DT, A.APPROVAL_ST, A.EMP_DRAFTER_ID, A.DOC_ID, (SELECT FORM_NAME FROM TB_APPROVAL_FORM WHERE FORM_ID = B.FORM_ID ) FORM_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_APPROVAL_ATTACH WHERE DOC_ID = A.DOC_ID ) attachCnt FROM TB_APPROVAL A, TB_APPROVAL_DOC B WHERE A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID
AND (A.DOC_ID IN(SELECT DOC_ID FROM TB_RECEPTION WHERE EMP_ID = #{empDrafterId}) OR A.DOC_ID IN(SELECT DOC_ID FROM TB_REFER WHERE EMP_ID = #{empDrafterId}) OR A.DOC_ID IN(SELECT DISTINCT E.DOC_ID FROM TB_APPROVAL A , TB_APPROVAL_HISTORY E WHERE E.DOC_ID(+) = A.DOC_ID AND E.EMP_ID = #{empDrafterId} AND E.HISTORY_ST = 1 AND E.HISTORY_TURN = 'N' AND A.APPROVAL_ST IN (2,3)) OR A.DOC_ID IN(SELECT DISTINCT F.DOC_ID FROM TB_APPROVAL A, TB_APPROVAL_HISTORY F WHERE F.DOC_ID(+) = A.DOC_ID AND F.EMP_ID = #{empDrafterId})) ORDER BY A.APPROVAL_RECOMMAND_DT DESC ) D1 ) D2 where seq >= #{firstIndex} ) D3 where rownum <= #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT APPROVAL_TITLE, APPROVAL_CONTENT, APPROVAL_RECOMMAND_DT, APPROVAL_TERMINATION_DT, APPROVAL_ST, APPROVAL_EMERGENCY_YN, APPROVAL_SECURITY, APPROVAL_END_DT, APPROVAL_AGENCY_YN, APPROVAL_PREDECESS_YN, EMP_DRAFTER_ID, DOC_ID, APPROVAL_CANCEL_REASON
FROM TB_APPROVAL WHERE DOC_ID = #{docId}

select D3.* from( select D2.* from( select rownum as seq, D1.* from( SELECT A.APPROVAL_TITLE, A.APPROVAL_RECOMMAND_DT, A.APPROVAL_ST, A.EMP_DRAFTER_ID, A.DOC_ID, C.FORM_NAME, COUNT(D.ATTACH_ID) attachCnt FROM TB_APPROVAL A, TB_APPROVAL_DOC B, TB_APPROVAL_FORM C, TB_APPROVAL_ATTACH D WHERE A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID AND B.FORM_ID = C.FORM_ID AND A.DOC_ID = D.DOC_ID(+) AND A.EMP_DRAFTER_ID = #{empDrafterId} AND A.APPROVAL_ST = 4

select D3.* from( select D2.* from( select rownum as seq, D1.* from( SELECT A.APPROVAL_TITLE, A.APPROVAL_RECOMMAND_DT, A.APPROVAL_ST, A.EMP_DRAFTER_ID, A.DOC_ID, C.FORM_NAME, COUNT(D.ATTACH_ID) attachCnt FROM TB_APPROVAL A, TB_APPROVAL_DOC B, TB_APPROVAL_FORM C, TB_APPROVAL_ATTACH D, TB_RECEPTION E WHERE A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID AND B.FORM_ID = C.FORM_ID AND A.DOC_ID = D.DOC_ID(+) AND A.DOC_ID = E.DOC_ID(+) AND E.EMP_ID = #{empDrafterId} AND NOT A.APPROVAL_ST IN(1,4,5)
GROUP BY A.APPROVAL_TITLE, A.APPROVAL_RECOMMAND_DT, A.APPROVAL_ST, A.EMP_DRAFTER_ID, A.DOC_ID, C.FORM_NAME ORDER BY A.APPROVAL_RECOMMAND_DT DESC ) D1 ) D2 where seq >= #{firstIndex} ) D3 where rownum <= #{recordCountPerPage}

select D3.* from( select D2.* from( select rownum as seq, D1.* from( SELECT A.APPROVAL_TITLE, A.APPROVAL_RECOMMAND_DT, A.APPROVAL_ST, A.EMP_DRAFTER_ID, A.DOC_ID, C.FORM_NAME, COUNT(D.ATTACH_ID) attachCnt FROM TB_APPROVAL A, TB_APPROVAL_DOC B, TB_APPROVAL_FORM C, TB_APPROVAL_ATTACH D, TB_REFER E WHERE A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID AND B.FORM_ID = C.FORM_ID AND A.DOC_ID = D.DOC_ID(+) AND A.DOC_ID = E.DOC_ID(+) AND E.EMP_ID = #{empDrafterId} AND NOT A.APPROVAL_ST IN(1,4,5)
GROUP BY A.APPROVAL_TITLE, A.APPROVAL_RECOMMAND_DT, A.APPROVAL_ST, A.EMP_DRAFTER_ID, A.DOC_ID, C.FORM_NAME ORDER BY A.APPROVAL_RECOMMAND_DT DESC ) D1 ) D2 where seq >= #{firstIndex} ) D3 where rownum <= #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT APPROVAL_TITLE, APPROVAL_CONTENT, APPROVAL_RECOMMAND_DT, APPROVAL_TERMINATION_DT, APPROVAL_ST, APPROVAL_EMERGENCY_YN, APPROVAL_SECURITY, APPROVAL_END_DT, APPROVAL_AGENCY_YN, APPROVAL_PREDECESS_YN, EMP_DRAFTER_ID, DOC_ID, APPROVAL_CANCEL_REASON FROM TB_APPROVAL WHERE DOC_ID = #{docId}
SELECT MAX(DOC_ID) FROM TB_APPROVAL_DOC

SELECT A.EMP_ID ,A.LINE_TYPE ,B.EMP_NAME ,C.DEPT_NAME ,D.ATTEND_ST_NAME ,E.CODE_NAME officialName FROM TB_APPROVAL_LINE_REGIST A, TB_EMP B, TB_DEPT C, TB_ATTEND_ST D, TB_CODE E WHERE B.EMP_ID = A.EMP_ID(+) AND C.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID(+) AND B.ATTEND_ST_ID = D.ATTEND_ST_ID(+) AND B.CODE_OFFICIAL_ID = E.CODE_ID AND A.LINE_ID = #{lineId} ORDER BY A.LINE_TYPE

SELECT COUNT(A.EMP_DRAFTER_ID) FROM TB_APPROVAL A, TB_APPROVAL_DOC B, TB_APPROVAL_FORM C WHERE A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID AND B.FORM_ID = C.FORM_ID AND A.EMP_DRAFTER_ID = #{empDrafterId} AND NOT A.APPROVAL_ST IN(4,5)

SELECT COUNT(A.DOC_ID) FROM TB_APPROVAL A ,TB_APPROVAL_DOC B ,TB_APPROVAL_FORM C ,TB_APPROVAL_ATTACH D ,TB_APPROVAL_HISTORY E WHERE E.DOC_ID(+) = A.DOC_ID AND A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID(+) AND C.FORM_ID = B.FORM_ID AND D.DOC_ID(+) = A.DOC_ID AND E.EMP_ID = #{empDrafterId} AND E.HISTORY_ST = 1 AND E.HISTORY_TURN = 'N' AND A.APPROVAL_ST IN (2,3)

SELECT COUNT(A.DOC_ID) FROM TB_APPROVAL A, TB_APPROVAL_DOC B, TB_APPROVAL_FORM C, TB_APPROVAL_ATTACH D WHERE A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID AND B.FORM_ID = C.FORM_ID AND A.DOC_ID = D.DOC_ID(+) AND A.EMP_DRAFTER_ID = #{empDrafterId} AND A.APPROVAL_ST = 4

SELECT COUNT(A.DOC_ID) FROM TB_APPROVAL A, TB_APPROVAL_DOC B, TB_APPROVAL_FORM C, TB_APPROVAL_ATTACH D, TB_RECEPTION E WHERE A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID AND B.FORM_ID = C.FORM_ID AND A.DOC_ID = D.DOC_ID(+) AND A.DOC_ID = E.DOC_ID(+) AND E.EMP_ID = #{empDrafterId} AND NOT A.APPROVAL_ST IN(1,4,5)

SELECT COUNT(A.DOC_ID) FROM TB_APPROVAL A, TB_APPROVAL_DOC B, TB_APPROVAL_FORM C, TB_APPROVAL_ATTACH D, TB_REFER E WHERE A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID AND B.FORM_ID = C.FORM_ID AND A.DOC_ID = D.DOC_ID(+) AND A.DOC_ID = E.DOC_ID(+) AND E.EMP_ID = #{empDrafterId} AND NOT A.APPROVAL_ST IN(1,4,5)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT F.DOC_ID) FROM TB_APPROVAL A, TB_APPROVAL_DOC B, TB_APPROVAL_FORM C, TB_APPROVAL_ATTACH D, TB_APPROVAL_HISTORY F, TB_EMP G, TB_CODE H WHERE B.DOC_ID = F.DOC_ID(+) AND B.DOC_ID = A.DOC_ID(+) AND F.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID AND C.FORM_ID = B.FORM_ID AND A.DOC_ID = D.DOC_ID(+) AND A.EMP_DRAFTER_ID = G.EMP_ID AND G.CODE_OFFICIAL_ID = H.CODE_ID AND F.EMP_ID = #{empDrafterId} AND F.HISTORY_ST = 0 AND F.HISTORY_TURN = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(A.APPROVAL_TITLE) FROM TB_APPROVAL A ,TB_APPROVAL_DOC B ,TB_APPROVAL_FORM C WHERE A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID AND C.FORM_ID = B.FORM_ID AND (A.DOC_ID IN(SELECT DOC_ID FROM TB_RECEPTION WHERE EMP_ID = #{empDrafterId}) OR A.DOC_ID IN(SELECT DOC_ID FROM TB_REFER WHERE EMP_ID = #{empDrafterId}) OR A.DOC_ID IN(SELECT DISTINCT E.DOC_ID FROM TB_APPROVAL A , TB_APPROVAL_HISTORY E WHERE E.DOC_ID(+) = A.DOC_ID AND E.EMP_ID = #{empDrafterId} AND E.HISTORY_ST = 1 AND E.HISTORY_TURN = 'N' AND A.APPROVAL_ST IN (2,3)) OR A.DOC_ID IN(SELECT DISTINCT F.DOC_ID FROM TB_APPROVAL A, TB_APPROVAL_HISTORY F WHERE F.DOC_ID(+) = A.DOC_ID AND F.EMP_ID = #{empDrafterId}))

SELECT A.EMP_AGENCY_ID ,A.AGENCY_GROUP_NAME ,B.EMP_NAME ,C.DEPT_NAME ,D.ATTEND_ST_NAME ,E.CODE_NAME officialName FROM TB_AGENCY A ,TB_EMP B ,TB_DEPT C ,TB_ATTEND_ST D ,TB_CODE E WHERE B.EMP_ID = A.EMP_AGENCY_ID(+) AND C.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID(+) AND B.ATTEND_ST_ID = D.ATTEND_ST_ID(+) AND B.CODE_OFFICIAL_ID = E.CODE_ID AND A.EMP_GRANTER_ID = #{empGranterId} AND A.AGENCY_ST = 1

SELECT A.EMP_AGENCY_ID ,A.AGENCY_GROUP_NAME ,B.EMP_NAME ,C.DEPT_NAME ,D.ATTEND_ST_NAME ,E.CODE_NAME officialName FROM TB_AGENCY A ,TB_EMP B ,TB_DEPT C ,TB_ATTEND_ST D ,TB_CODE E WHERE B.EMP_ID = A.EMP_AGENCY_ID(+) AND C.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID(+) AND B.ATTEND_ST_ID = D.ATTEND_ST_ID(+) AND B.CODE_OFFICIAL_ID = E.CODE_ID AND A.EMP_GRANTER_ID = #{empGranterId} AND A.AGENCY_GROUP_NAME = '대결자' AND A.AGENCY_ST = 1
